ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_suke_inv: Creates a spherical zone where blocks gradually become invisible for nearby observers.
ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_suke_pun: Turns a targeted block invisible after hitting it.
ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_suke_dif: Diffract light to fire seven powerful rainbow explosions after a 5s channel.
ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_bomu_air: Creates explosive bursts of air around the user for 30 seconds; non-destructive to blocks.
ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_blast_ju: The user detonates an explosion beneath their feet, launching themselves high into the air.
ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_piercing: The user compresses air into a focused laser that pierces the target and detonates inside them, causing devastating internal damage.
ability.awakenawakennomi.titan.descripti: Allows the user to increase their size to that of a titan.
ability.awakenawakennomi.titan_trample.d: Running speed increases with acceleration trampling any nearby entity.
ability.awakenawakennomi.titan_smash.des: Allows the user to smash as a Titan.
awakenawakennomi.ability.ground_only: You must be on the ground to use this ability.
ability.message.need_suke_invisible: You need Suke Invisible to use this ability.
